reviewText: This is a bio of Mick Doohan first three titles. He won 5 in a row. It goes over his accident in which he almost lost his leg. Dr. Costa was responsible for saving it. His tough following season which didn't turn out very well. His breakout year in 1990.94-96 in which he won three straight. His thoughts of retiring earlier because of his accidents. This is well worth the watch.
